special_text:
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
[-1]: Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains catalyze until end of turn. Add {R}.
[-2]: Ral deals 3 damage to any target.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, add that card’s effects to that spell.”
